name: Project Platformer
description:
"H34RT, the lab is collapsing. you have to run! the only route available for you is trough the chambers... the chambers will be filled with danger, now go!"

[/ / / D E T A I L S / / /]

You will play as a small little cute experiment bot, equipped with a Speed Changer, escaping the lab trough the chambers. You'll be faced with Sparky-Tr4ps and Energy Pellets as you try to escape the deadly collapsing chambers of Generico Research Facility!

[/ / / C O N T R O L S / / / ]

[A][D] or [Left Arrow Keys][Right Arrow keys] - To Move

[Space] - To Jump

[Esc] - To Pause 

[1][Numpad 1][Comma] - To change to Speed1

[2][Numpad 2][Period] - To change to Speed2

[3][Numpad 3][/] - To change to Speed3

[/ / / W A R N I N G / / /]

Pressing [R] will make you Self Destruct!

[/ / / Future Updates / / /]

-Activating Level 2 and Level 3

-Adding Slide Function

-Remake Level 1
